activebackground.description: Background color when the button is under the cursor.

activeforeground.description: Foreground color when the button is under the cursor.

highlightcolor.description: The color of the focus highlight when the widget has focus.

bd.description: Border width in pixels. Default is 2.

command.description: Function or method to be called when the button is clicked.

font.description: Text font to be used for the button's label.

image.description: Image to be displayed on the button (instead of text).

justify.description: How to show multiple text lines: LEFT to left-justify each line; CENTER to center them; or RIGHT to right-justify.

padx.description: Additional padding left and right of the text.

pady.description: Additional padding above and below the text.

relief.description: Relief specifies the type of the border. Some of the values are SUNKEN, RAISED, GROOVE, and RIDGE.

state.description: Set this option to DISABLED to gray out the button and make it unresponsive. Has the value ACTIVE when the mouse is over it. Default is NORMAL.

underline.description: Default is -1, meaning that no character of the text on the button will be underlined. If nonnegative, the corresponding text character will be underlined.

wraplength.description: If this value is set to a positive number, the text lines will be wrapped to fit within this length.
